hevs.gdx2d.components.colors

Class Palette

  • java.lang.Object
    • hevs.gdx2d.components.colors.Palette

  • public class Palette
extends java.lang.Object
    Nice color palettes for drawing nice stuff. Each element of the palette can be used as a Color with the proper conversion (for instance by using ColorUtils). Each color of each palette has a nice effect with the other colors of the same palette
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry

      static Color[] thought
      The amazing Thought Provoking palette from www.colourlovers.com
